title: From an older post
content:
Can we take a look at an old post where the font was not identified?  
 [http://www.typophile.com/node/92142](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414110711/http:/www.typophile.com/node/92142 "http://www.typophile.com/node/92142")  
The original poster says the font is from the 70's and there is some resemblance to the later Iowan Old Style. I'm still curious.
author: J. Tillman

comments.content: Bembo Book MT Std from Monotype
